ja156:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja156:0.4_0: and by those who don’t understand mind.
ja156:1.2_0: and struck by a large plank
ja156:2.1_0: Even so, an astute person accomplished in vision,
ja156:2.2_0: should examine the aggregates like this,
ja156:2.4_0: for the sake of finding sanctuary.
